section.p: A Phtograph of chest taken by X-Ray.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] chestXRay with data type Code
Indicates the results of the diagnostic test CHEST X-RAY. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfChestXRay with data type Point In Time
The date of the diagnostic test CHEST X-RAY.

Contains exactly one [1..1] chestXRay with data type Code
Indicates the results of the diagnostic test CHEST X-RAY. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfChestXRay with data type Point In Time
The date of the diagnostic test CHEST X-RAY.
